quote: Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right.
author: Max Lucado

quote: Have faith in God; God has faith in you.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: To fall in love with God is the greatest romance; to seek him the greatest adventure; to find him, the greatest human achievement.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: To trust God in the light is nothing, but trust him in the dark - that is faith.
author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quote: God is good all the time. Every time.
author: Russell Wilson

quote: When you keep God in first place, He will take you to places you’ve never dreamed of.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Faith is the eternal elixir. It gives life, power, and action to the impulse of thought.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: There is nothing in life so difficult that it cannot be overcome. This faith can move mountains. It can change people. It can change the world. You can survive all the great storms in your life.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: It’s our faith that activates the power of God.
author: Joel Osteen
Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: When the pain overtakes you, reach inside. Gather the broken pieces, and hand them to God. Ask Him to remake your heart. Different, this time. Stronger. More beautiful. This is how we are made, and remade by the Maker.
author: Yasmin Mogahed

quote: There are four principles we need to maintain: First, read the Word of God. Second, consume the Word of God until it consumes you. Third believe the Word of God. Fourth, act on the Word.
author: Smith Wigglesworth

quote: An infinite God can give all of Himself to each of His children. He does not distribute Himself that each may have a part, but to each one He gives all of Himself as fully as if there were no others.
author: A.W. Tozer

quote: The Gospel is that Jesus Christ came to earth, lived the life we should have lived and died the death we should have died.
author: Timothy Keller

quote: Without the Spirit of God, we can do nothing. We are as ships without wind. We are useless.
author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quote: Do not be afraid to be holy! Have the courage and humility to present yourselves to the world determined to be holy, since full, true freedom is born from holiness.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: Spending time with God is the key to our strength and success in all areas of life. Be sure that you never try to work God into your schedule, but always work your schedule around Him.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Faith in action is love, and love in action is service. By transforming that faith into living acts of love, we put ourselves in contact with God Himself, with Jesus our Lord.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Christ is glorified in you when he is more precious to you than all that life can give or death can take.
author: John Piper

quote: God didn’t call me to be successful, He called me to be faithful.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: We are unceasing spiritual beings with an eternal destiny in God’s great universe.
author: Dallas Willard

quote: The world promises you comfort, but you were not made for comfort. You were made for greatness.
author: Pope Benedict XVI

quote: God is God. He knows what he is doing. When you can’t trace his hand, trust his heart.
author: Max Lucado

quote: To say that I am made in the image of God is to say that love is the reason for my existence, for God is love. Love is my true identity. Selflessness is my true self. Love is my true character. Love is my name.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: God’s way is better than your way. His plan is bigger than your plan. His dream for your life is more rewarding, more fulfilling, better than you’ve ever dreamed of. Now stay open and let God do it His way.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Advent increases our hope, a hope which does not disappoint. The Lord never lets us down.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Christ beside me, Christ before me, Christ behind me, Christ within me, Christ beneath me, Christ above me.
author: Saint Patrick

quote: My secret is simple – I pray.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Give your life to God; he can do more with it than you can!
author: D.L. Moody

quote: Do not be afraid of what God asks of you! It is worth saying ‘yes’ to God. In him we find joy.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Love is an act of faith.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Joy is the settled assurance that God is in control of all the details of my life, the quiet confidence that ultimately everything is going to be all right, and the determined choice to praise God in all things.
author: Kay Warren

quote: God has plans, not problems for our lives. The life of a Christian is an education for a higher service. God is training you for something.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: There’s a difference between knowing God and knowing about God. When you truly know God, you have energy to serve Him, boldness to share Him, and contentment in Him.
author: J.I. Packer

quote: God is most glorified in us when we are most satisfied in Him.
author: John Piper

quote: Don’t give up on God, because God will not give up on you.
author: Nick Vujicic

quote: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.
author: — Genesis 1:1

quote: Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: This is God’s universal purpose for all Christian suffering: more contentment in God and less satisfaction in the world.
author: John Piper

quote: Faith and prayer are the vitamins of the soul; man cannot live in health without them.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: The most holy and necessary practice in our spiritual life is the presence of God. That means finding constant pleasure in His divine company, speaking humbly and lovingly with him in all seasons, at every moment, without limiting the conversation in any way.
author: Brother Lawrence

quote: Being a disciple means being constantly ready to bring the love of Jesus to others, and this can happen unexpectedly and in any place: on the street, in a city square, during work, on a journey.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Let nothing disturb you. Let nothing frighten you. Everything passes away except God. God alone is sufficient.
author: Teresa of Ávila

quote: Faith keeps the person who keeps the faith.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: When you take time with God and listen to His voice, He renews your strength and enables you to handle life.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Trust the past to the mercy of God, the present to His love, and the future to His providence.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: We are the Bibles the world is reading; We are the creeds the world is needing; We are the sermons the world is heeding.
author: Billy Graham

quote: It may look impossible, but God can do the impossible. Just because you don’t see anything happening doesn’t mean God is not working.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Trust yourself in God’s hands. Maintain your relationship to Jesus Christ by the patience of faith. ‘Though He slay me, yet will I trust in Him.’
author: — Oswald Chambers

quote: I serve God, and my purpose is to please Him, and if God be for you, who can be against you?
author: — Ben Carson

quote: The life of faith is lived one day at a time, and it has to be lived – not always looked forward to as though the “real” living were around the next corner. It is today for which we are responsible. God still owns tomorrow.
author: — Elisabeth Elliot

quote: The problem with the world is that the intelligent people are full of doubts, while the stupid ones are full of confidence.
author: — Charles Bukowski

quote: God, I pray Thee, light these idle sticks of my life and may I burn for Thee. Consume my life, my God, for it is Thine. I seek not a long life, but a full one, like you, Lord Jesus.
author: — Jim Elliot

quote: Praise God, from whom all blessings flow! Praise Him, all creatures here below! Praise Him above, ye heavenly host! Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost!
author: — Thomas Ken

quote: God cannot give us a happiness and peace apart from Himself, because it is not there. There is no such thing.
author: — C. S. Lewis

quote: You can’t make God move in your life, but you can make room for God to move in your life.
author: — Steven Furtick

quote: We walk by faith, not by sight.
author: — Paul the Apostle

quote: God will give you strength when you think you can’t go on. He will give you joy when you should be discouraged. He can make a way when it looks impossible.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Why would we want fame, when God promises us glory? Why would we be seeking the wealth of the world when the wealth of heaven is ours? Why would we run for a crown that will perish with time, when we’re called to win a crown that is imperishable?
author: — Paul Washer

quote: Faith is deliberate confidence in the character of God whose ways you may not understand at the time.
author: — Oswald Chambers

quote: Have your heart right with Christ, and he will visit you often, and so turn weekdays into Sundays, meals into sacraments, homes into temples, and earth into heaven.
author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quote: A disciple is a person who has decided that the most important thing in their life is to learn how to do what Jesus said to do.
author: Dallas Willard

quote: Remember who you are. Don’t compromise for anyone, for any reason. You are a child of the Almighty God. Live that truth.
author: — Lysa TerKeurst

quote: Keep your dreams alive. Understand to achieve anything requires faith and belief in yourself, vision, hard work, determination, and dedication. Remember all things are possible for those who believe.
author: — Gail Devers

quote: You have one business on earth – to save souls.
author: — John Wesley

quote: First doubt your doubts before you doubt your faith. We must never allow doubt to hold us prisoner and keep us from the divine love, peace, and gifts that come through faith in the Lord Jesus Christ.
author: — Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quote: God uses broken things. It takes broken soil to produce a crop, broken clouds to give rain, broken grain to give bread, broken bread to give strength. It is the broken alabaster box that gives forth perfume. It is Peter, weeping bitterly, who returns to greater power than ever.
author: — Vance Havner

quote: The gospel is this: We are more sinful and flawed in ourselves than we ever dared believe, yet at the very same time we are more loved and accepted in Jesus Christ than we ever dared hope.
author: Timothy Keller

quote: The Bible is the book of my life. It’s the book I live with, the book I live by, the book I want to die by.
author: — N. T. Wright

quote: There are no ‘ifs’ in God’s Kingdom. His timing is perfect. His will is our hiding place. Lord Jesus, keep me in Your will! Don’t let me go mad by poking about outside it.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: The point of your life is to point to Him. Whatever you are doing, God wants to be glorified, because this whole thing is His.
author: — Francis Chan

quote: Any other foundation will fail, but Christ is a sure and steady rock to build your life on.
author: Billy Graham

quote: You have a great God who loves you and cares about you. Be full of hope that something good can happen to you. God is a master at new beginnings. He loves fresh beginnings, He makes all things new.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: As this New Year begins, ask God to help you tune your life every day to His Word, so you can bring harmony and joy to those around you.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Many of us are missing something in life because we are after the second best, I put before you what I have found to be the best – one who is worthy of all our devotion – Jesus Christ. He is the Saviour for the young and the old. Lord, here I am.
author: — Eric Liddell

quote: To have faith is to trust yourself to the water. When you swim you don’t grab hold of the water, because if you do you will sink and drown. Instead you relax, and float.
author: — Alan Watts

quote: You know, eternal life does not start when we go to heaven. It starts the moment you reach out to Jesus. He never turns His back on anyone. And He is waiting for you...
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: Waiting on God requires the willingness to bear uncertainty, to carry within oneself the unanswered question, lifting the heart to God about it whenever it intrudes upon one’s thoughts.
author: — Elisabeth Elliot

quote: The Scotch catechism says that man’s chief end is ‘to glorify God and enjoy Him forever.’ But we shall then know that these are the same thing. Fully to enjoy is to glorify. In commanding us to glorify Him, God is inviting us to enjoy Him.
author: — C. S. Lewis

quote: God has equipped you to handle difficult things. In fact, He has already planted the seeds of discipline and self-control inside you. You just have to water those seeds with His Word to make them grow!
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: I know God is in charge. Not me, I’m nothing. I wouldn’t be anything except for the power of the spirit of God.
author: Billy Graham

quote: No pit is so deep that He is not deeper still; with Jesus even in our darkest moments, the best remains and the very best is yet to be.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: God, grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change, courage to change the things I can, and wisdom to know the difference.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don’t see the whole staircase.
author: — Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Do small things, with great love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Don’t be sad! Because God sends hope in the most desperate moments. Don’t forget, the heaviest rain comes out of the darkest clouds.
author: — Rumi

quote: He is no fool who gives what he cannot keep to gain that which he cannot lose.
author: — Jim Elliot

quote: If we find ourselves with a desire that nothing in this world can satisfy, the most probable explanation is that we were made for another world.
author: — C. S. Lewis

quote: God proved His love on the Cross. When Christ hung, and bled, and died, it was God saying to the world, ‘I love you.’
author: Billy Graham

quote: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
author: — Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Today is a new day, so rise up and move forward into the victory God has prepared for you!
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I have learned to kiss the waves that throw me up against the Rock of Ages.
author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quote: God speaks in the silence of the heart.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
author: — Helen Keller

quote: Above all else, guard your heart, for everything you do flows from it.
author: — Solomon

quote: God’s timing is always perfect. Trust His delays. He’s got you.
author: — Tony Evans

quote: Finding God in All Things.
author: — Ignatius of Loyola

quote: I’ve read the last page of the Bible. It’s all going to turn out all right.
author: Billy Graham

quote: There is power in prayer. When men work, they work. but when men pray, God works.
author: — Angus Buchan

quote: We can ignore even pleasure. But pain insists upon being attended to. God whispers to us in our pleasures, speaks in our conscience, but shouts in our pains: it is his megaphone to rouse a deaf world.
author: — C. S. Lewis

quote: It represents a Bible verse I wear on my shoe. Philippians 4:13. It says ‘I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.’ It’s also my mantra, how I get up for games and why I play the way I do.
author: — Stephen Curry

quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
author: — Martin Luther

quote: Faith is not believing that God can. It is knowing that God will.
author: — Ben Stein

quote: An hour of study, for the modern apostle, is an hour of prayer.
author: — Josemaría Escrivá

quote: Tell your heart that the fear of suffering is worse than the suffering itself. And that no heart has ever suffered when it goes in search of its dreams, because every second of the search is a second’s encounter with God and with eternity.
author: — Paulo Coelho

quote: Your life is nothing more than a love story. Between you and God. Nothing more. Every person, every experience, every gift, every loss, every pain is sent to your path for one reason and one reason only: to bring you back to Him.
author: Yasmin Mogahed

quote: Nothing is impossible to the person who backs DESIRE with enduring FAITH.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Trust God, and do the next thing.
author: — Oswald Chambers

quote: Nothing teaches us about the preciousness of the Creator as much as when we learn the emptiness of everything else.
author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quote: If your parents are alive, be grateful at the opportunity to earn Jannah by serving them.
author: — Nouman Ali Khan

quote: If sinners be damned, at least let them leap to Hell over our bodies. If they will perish, let them perish with our arms about their knees. Let no one go there unwarned and unprayed for.
author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quote: You will never know the fullness of Christ until you know the emptiness of everything but Christ.
author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love.
author: — Francis of Assisi

quote: When you get to the end of all the light you know and it’s time to step into the darkness of the unknown, faith is knowing that one of two things shall happen: either you will be given something solid to stand on, or you will be taught how to fly.
author: — Edward Teller

quote: Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.
author: — Warren Buffett

quote: The law operates by faith. If you believe, no effort is necessary to see the fulfillment of your every desire.
author: — Neville Goddard

quote: Faith in God includes Faith in God’s timing.
author: — Neal A. Maxwell

quote: The safest place to be is in the center of God’s will.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: Faith sees the invisible, believes the unbelievable, and receives the impossible.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: No amount of worrying can change the future. Go easy on yourself, for the outcome of all affairs is determined by God’s decree. If something is meant to go elsewhere, it will never come your way, but if it is yours by destiny, from you it cannot flee.
author: — Umar

quote: You’ve got to believe that God is in control of your life. It may be a tough time but you’ve got to believe that God has a reason for it and he’s going to make everything good.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: How Religion Works: If I obey, then God will love and accept me. The Gospel: I’m loved and accepted, therefore I wish to obey.
author: Timothy Keller

quote: Obey God and leave all the consequences to Him.
author: — Charles F. Stanley

quote: Smart men walked on the moon, daring men walked on the ocean floor, but wise men walk with God.
author: — Leonard Ravenhill

quote: To one who has faith, no explanation is necessary. To one without faith, no explanation is possible.
author: — Thomas Aquinas

quote: You are loved with an everlasting love. And underneath are the everlasting arms.
author: — Elisabeth Elliot

quote: A man of God in the will of God is immortal until His work is done.
author: — David Jeremiah

quote: If we pray, we will believe; If we believe, we will love; If we love, we will serve.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Trust God and Believe in good things to come!
author: — Jeffrey R. Holland

quote: Let God’s promises shine on your problems.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: If you want to hear God speak, read your Bible. If you want to hear God speak audibly, read your Bible out loud.
author: — Justin Peters

quote: I refuse to accept the view that mankind is so tragically bound to the starless midnight of racism and war that the bright daybreak of peace and brotherhood can never become a reality... I believe that unarmed truth and unconditional love will have the final word.
author: — Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Whenever you are alone, remind yourself that God has sent everyone else away so that there is only you and Him.
author: — Rumi

quote: Watch to see where God is working and join Him in His work.
author: — Henry Blackaby

quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
author: — Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Have courage for the great sorrows of life and patience for the small ones; and when you have laboriously accomplished your daily task, go to sleep in peace.
author: — Victor Hugo

quote: Faith and Reason are like two wings of the human spirit by which it soars to the truth.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: I want to thank you, Lord, for life and all that’s in it. Thank you for the day and for the hour, and the minute.
author: — Maya Angelou

quote: Don’t you quit. You keep walking, you keep trying, there is help and happiness ahead. Some blessings come soon. Some come late. Some don’t come until heaven. But for those who embrace the gospel of Jesus Christ, they come. It will be alright in the end. Trust God and believe in Good Things to Come.
author: — Jeffrey R. Holland

quote: Every Christian needs a half-hour of prayer each day, except when he is busy, then he needs an hour.
author: — Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Great faith is the product of great fights. Great testimonies are the outcome of great tests. Great triumphs can only come out of great trials.
author: Smith Wigglesworth

quote: You’re going to go through tough times – that’s life. But I say, ‘Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.’ See the positive in negative events.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: All I have seen teaches me to trust the creator for all I have not seen.
author: — Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: God’s present is his presence. His greatest gift is himself.
author: Max Lucado

quote: If, in the end, you have not chosen Jesus Christ it will not matter what you have chosen.
author: — Neal A. Maxwell

quote: We do not draw people to Christ by loudly discrediting what they believe, by telling them how wrong they are and how right we are, but by showing them a light that is so lovely that they want with all their hearts to know the source of it.
author: — Madeleine L'Engle

quote: Every day is a gift from God. Learn to focus on the Giver and enjoy the gift!
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: To be saints is not a privilege for a few, but a vocation for everyone.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Life without God is like an unsharpened pencil – it has no point.
author: Billy Graham

quote: He who has God has everything; he who has everything but God has nothing.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Preach the Gospel at all times and when necessary use words.
author: — Francis of Assisi

quote: God’s work done in God’s way will never lack God’s supply.
author: — James Hudson Taylor

quote: Heaven on Earth is a choice you must make, not a place you must find.
author: — Wayne W. Dyer

quote: God loves each of us as if there were only one of us.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Faith is a passionate intuition.
author: — William Wordsworth

quote: Why should the sons and daughters of God be reluctant to pray, when prayer is the key in the hand of faith to unlock heaven’s storehouse, where are treasured the boundless resources of Omnipotence.
author: — Ellen G. White

quote: A little faith will bring your soul to heaven; a great faith will bring heaven to your soul.
author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quote: When you use your life for God’s glory, everything you do can become an act of worship.
author: — Rick Warren

quote: Spiritual identity means we are not what we do or what people say about us. And we are not what we have. We are the beloved daughters and sons of God.
author: — Henri J.M. Nouwen

quote: I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else.
author: — C. S. Lewis

quote: Go forward bravely. Fear nothing. Trust in God; all will be well.
author: — Joan of Arc

quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Each one of them is Jesus in disguise.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: If you believe what you like in the gospels, and reject what you don’t like, it is not the gospel you believe, but yourself.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: God does not begin by asking us about our ability, but only about our availability, and if we then prove our dependability, he will increase our capability.
author: — Neal A. Maxwell

quote: Faith goes up the stairs that love has built and looks out the windows which hope has opened.
author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quote: There is no panic in Heaven! God has no problems, only plans.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
author: — Helen Keller

quote: You can never learn that Christ is all you need, until Christ is all you have.
author: Corrie ten Boom

quote: If you will make time with God your first priority, everything else in your life will fall into place.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: In faith there is enough light for those who want to believe and enough shadows to blind those who don’t.
author: — Blaise Pascal

quote: Doubt is a pain too lonely to know that faith is his twin brother.
author: — Khalil Gibran

quote: Love means to commit oneself without guarantee, to give oneself completely in the hope that our love will produce love in the loved person. Love is an act of faith, and whoever is of little faith is also of little love.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Pain and suffering have come into your life, but remember pain, sorrow, suffering are but the kiss of Jesus – a sign that you have come so close to Him that He can kiss you.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: You are destined to reign in life. You are called by the Lord to be a success, to enjoy wealth, to enjoy health, and to enjoy a life of victory. It is not the Lord’s desire that you live a life of defeat, poverty, and failure.
author: — Joseph Prince

quote: Behold the Lamb of God who takes away the sin of the world!
author: — John the Baptist

quote: We don’t need self-confidence we need God-confidence.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Believe in a love that is being stored up for you like an inheritance, and have faith that in this love there is a strength and a blessing so large that you can travel as far as you wish without having to step outside it.
author: — Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Anything under God’s control is never out of control.
author: — Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Men go abroad to wonder at the heights of mountains, at the huge waves of the sea, at the long courses of the rivers, at the vast compass of the ocean, at the circular motions of the stars, and they pass by themselves without wondering.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Focus on giants – you stumble. Focus on God – Giants tumble.
author: Max Lucado

quote: I would rather have a mind opened by wonder than one closed by belief.
author: — Gerry Spence

quote: Jesus, I love you. Jesus, I love you.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Being a Christian is more than just an instantaneous conversion – it is a daily process whereby you grow to be more and more like Christ.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Worship is an inward feeling and outward action that reflects the worth of God.
author: John Piper

quote: We need never shout across the spaces to an absent God. He is nearer than our own soul, closer than our most secret thoughts.
author: A.W. Tozer

quote: I believe in everything until it’s disproved. So I believe in fairies, the myths, dragons. It all exists, even if it’s in your mind. Who’s to say that dreams and nightmares aren’t as real as the here and now?
author: — John Lennon

quote: Evil is real – but so is God’s power and love.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Words which do not give the light of Christ increase the darkness.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Be of good cheer. The future is as bright as your faith.
author: — Thomas S. Monson

quote: God is working on your problem. Stay calm. Stay sweet. Stay out of fear and keep on keeping on.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Prayer is the breath, the watchword, the comfort, the strength, the honor of a Christian.
author: Charles H. Spurgeon

quote: The life of Jesus is a life for others. It is a life of service.
author: Pope Francis

quote: Faith is not something to grasp, it is a state to grow into.
author: — Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The deep meaning of the cross of Christ is that there is no suffering on earth that is not borne by God.
author: — Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quote: Happy day after Christmas and a merry rest of the year! Even when Christmas is over, the light of the world is still here.
author: — Matthew West

quote: This is my Bible. I am what it says I am. I have what it says I have. I can do what it says I can do.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Jesus said go and make disciples, but so often we just sit and make excuses.
author: — Francis Chan
